Test Spex
The first test act
First test scene in first act
Nobody and Nothing are doing nothing.
Nobody:  I have an idea!
Nothing: Yeah? What's that?
Nobody:  Well, nothing.


Second test scene in first act
Nothing and Nobody are still doing nothing
Nobody:  Hey, Nothing, you know what?!
Nothing: Huh?
Nobody:  Something truly awesome just happened!
Nothing: Yeah, what?!
Nobody:  Yeah!
